content: I would have expected searching for fin_cases or interval_cases to produce the right top hit in https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs. But they don't, because the elaboration rules are finCases and intervalCases. Is that a bug?
I think the bug is that we have effectively no tactic documentation or index
Which is made worse by the naming convention being inconsistent between tactics and elaborators
but doc-gen isn't doing that right now
